dir-entry.dir-entry-name: President

dir-section.heading: Council of Ministers
dir-section.p: The Government comprises members of Evropa Sad! (ES!—Europe Now!), the Socijalistička Narodna Partija Crne Gore (SNP—Socialist People’s Party of Montenegro), Demokratska Crna Gora (DCG—Democratic Montenegro), Savez Građana CIVIS (CIVIS—Citizens’ Union CIVIS), Alternativa Shqiptare (Albanian Alternative) and the Partia Demokratike (PD—Democratic Party).
